sentences.en: He left last Tuesday — at least, I think he did.
sentences.cn: 上星期二他离开了,反正我认为他已经走了.

sentences.en: He phoned on Tuesday, just before you came.
sentences.cn: 他星期二来电话了，就在你来之前。

sentences.en: He promised to come on Tuesday but he never showed up.
sentences.cn: 他答应星期二来,可是一直未露面.

sentences.en: I can't come on Tuesday. When else can we meet?
sentences.cn: 星期二我不能来. 我们能在其他什么时候碰头 呢 ?

sentences.en: New York holds its primary election on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 纽约州将在星期二举行预选。

sentences.en: Only half of us came last Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 上星期二我们只有一半人来了.

sentences.en: She's been off work since Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 星期二以来她一直没上班。

sentences.en: The five were expected to be hanged at 7 am on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 那5个人将在周二早上7点被施以绞刑。

sentences.en: The Governor will appear before the committee next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 下周二，州长将接受委员会的质询。

sentences.en: The new governor's assumption of office will take place next Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 新州长将于下星期二到任就职.

sentences.en: The theatre is booked up for every evening this week except Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 除星期二外,本周每晚戏票预订一空.

sentences.en: They'll probably be here Monday and Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 他们星期一和星期二可能会在这儿。

sentences.en: Tuesday's lunch overran by three-quarters of an hour.
sentences.cn: 星期二的午餐超时了45分钟。

sentences.en: Tuesday's notable gainer was Sony, which reached a high of 9,070 yen.
sentences.cn: 星期二的大赢家为索尼公司，其股票上涨至9,070日元的高点。

phrases.tran_cn: 超级星期二；总统竞选初选日（通常在3月份的）

trans.tran_en: the day between Monday and Wednesday
the day between Monday and Wednesday
